memberSignatures.value: protected virtual Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution SelectType (Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution resolution, Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema schema);

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution SelectType(class Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution resolution, class Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema schema) cil managed

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.summary: The resolution for the type being mapped to the union schema.

parameters.name: schema
parameters.summary: A child of the union schema.

returns.summary:
The resolution to build the child serializer with. The type in the original resolution
            must be assignable from the type in the returned resolution.

overloads.summary:
Customizes type resolutions for the children of a union schema. Can be overriden by
            custom cases to support polymorphic mapping.
